name: Farming until bankruptcy
description:
You're a farming bunny deep in the red, hop around, farm as much as you can and try to delay your inevitable bankruptcy!

This was  my  game submission for the Ludum Dare #50 Compo "Delay the inevitable". This is an improved version based on user feedback (Changelog). You can also play the original version here.

Source Code available at https://github.com/atomicptr/ld50
